section.p: Use the following links and tools to begin working with :

ul.li:
system administrationThis document provides information pertaining to ongoing administration of a system, including information for managing the physical nodes and physical networks.
Reference Link - system administration

cloud administration
This guide provides information on topics that an OpenStack administrator would be responsible for, except for the management of the physical nodes and physical networks, which is covered in the System Administration guide. Reference Link - cloud administration

li.p: This guide provides a description of the delta between the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade REST API and the open-source OpenStack REST API. A high-level description of the semantics around objects and parameters are described in the REST API Documentation.

ul.li:
users guideThis document provides information about the operational actions that a tenant user can take.
Reference Link - users guide

vnf integrationThis guide provides information to help you integrate your VNFs into a system.
Reference Link - vnf integration

software managementThis document provides instructions for applying patches and software upgrades to hosts.
Reference Link - software management

li.p: The Software Development Kit (SDK) provides drivers, daemons, API libraries,and configuration files that you can include in a guest image to leverage the extended capabilities of . These components can be used to enhance or extend the networking features of the applications and to access the virtual machine (VM) management capabilities of .
